CustomField.description: This field determines the end date of GTM partner assignment. If the biz needs to make expiry date mandatory,there is a "GTM partner assignment_ExpiryDateMandatory",validation rule that will make sure user selects the date before SAVING the record. The date field should be history tracked
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the expiry date of partner assignment by using calendar pick-up
CustomField.label: Linkage_Expiry Date
